00011 XMLMessage::XMLMessage()
00012 {
00013     doc = NULL;

00019 XMLMessage::XMLMessage(const Message& MesgFromPeer)
00020 {
00021     doc         = XMLTreeParser::ParseMessage(MesgFromPeer.GetLength(), (unsigned char*)MesgFromPeer.GetBuffer());;
00022     origine = MesgFromPeer.GetOrigine();
00023     pid         = MesgFromPeer.GetPeerId();
00024     mid         = MesgFromPeer.GetMsgId();
00025 }

00027 XMLMessage::~XMLMessage()
00028 {
00029     if ( doc != NULL )
00030     {
00031         xmlFreeDoc(doc);
00032         doc = NULL;
00033     }
00034 }
00035 
00036 XMLMessage::XMLMessage(const XMLMessage& msg)
00037 {
00038     if ( msg.doc )
00039     {
00040         doc = xmlCopyDoc(msg.doc, 1 ); // 1 stands for recursive copy
00041     }
00042     else
00043     {
00044         doc = NULL;
00045     }
00046     origine = msg.origine;
00047     pid = msg.pid;
00048     mid = msg.mid;
00049 }

00051 xmlNodePtr XMLMessage::GetRootNode()
00052 {
00053     if(doc) return xmlDocGetRootElement(doc);
00054     else return NULL;
00055 }

00057 void XMLMessage::Display(FILE* fout)
00058 {
00059     DisplayNode(GetRootNode(), fout);

00062 xmlAttrPtr XMLMessage::FindAttribute(const SimpleString name, xmlNodePtr node)
00063 {
00064     if(node)
00065     {
00066         xmlAttrPtr current = node->properties;
00067         while(current)
00068         {
00069             if( name == (const char*)current->name )
00070             {
00071                 return current;
00072             }
00073             current = current->next;
00074         }
00075     }
00076     return NULL;
00077 }
00078 
00079 xmlNodePtr XMLMessage::FindFirstChild(const SimpleString name, xmlNodePtr node)
00080 {
00081     if(node)
00082     {
00083         xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00084         while(current)
00085         {
00086             if( (current->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) && (name == (const char*)current->name) )
00087             {
00088                 return current;
00089             }
00090             current = current->next;
00091         }
00092     }
00093     return NULL;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void XMLMessage::DisplayNode(xmlNodePtr node, FILE* fout)
00097 {
00098     if(node)
00099     {
00100         xmlNodePtr current = node->children;
00101         if(current)
00102         {
00103             fprintf(fout, "<%s>\n", node->name);
00104             while(current)
00105             {
00106                 if((current->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE))
00107                     DisplayNode(current, fout);
00108                 current = current->next;
00109             }
00110             fprintf(fout, "</%s>\n", node->name);
00111         }
00112         else fprintf(fout, "<%s/>\n", node->name);
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 SimpleString XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(xmlNodePtr node)
00117 {
00118     SimpleString str;
00119     bool cdata = false;
00120 
00121     xmlNodePtr cur = node;
00122 
00123     for(; cur && !cdata; cur = cur->next)
00124     {
00125         if(cur->type == XML_TEXT_NODE)
00126         {
00127             str += (const char*)cur->content;
00128         }
00129         else if(cur->type == XML_CDATA_SECTION_NODE)
00130         {
00131             str = (const char*)cur->content;
00132             cdata = false;
00133         }
00134     }
00135     return str;
00136 }

00165 void XMLTreeParser::Receive(MsgSocket& ConnectionPoint, MsgSocketCallBackData& cd)
00166 {
00167     XMLMessage * msg = new OMISCID_TLM XMLMessage(cd.Msg);
00168     if ( msg && msg->doc != NULL )
00169     {
00170         PushMessage(msg);
00171     }
00172     else
00173     {
00174         if ( msg != NULL )
00175         {
00176             delete msg;
00177         }
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void XMLTreeParser::PushMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00182 {
00183     SmartLocker SL_listXMLMsg(listXMLMsg);
00184 
00185     listXMLMsg.Add(msg);
00186     event.Signal();
00187     event.Reset();
00188 }
00189 
00190 int XMLTreeParser::ProcessMessages()
00191 {
00192     SmartLocker SL_listXMLMsg(listXMLMsg);
00193 
00194     int nb = 0;
00195     XMLMessage* msg = NULL;
00196     while( listXMLMsg.IsNotEmpty() )
00197     {
00198         msg = listXMLMsg.ExtractFirst();
00199         try
00200         {
00201             ProcessAMessage(msg);
00202         }
00203         catch( SimpleException &e )
00204         {
00205             OmiscidTrace( "'%s' occurs when processing XML message : %s (%d)\n", e.GetExceptionType().GetStr(), e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00206         }
00207         delete msg;
00208         // listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00209         nb++;
00210     }
00211 
00212     return nb;
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 void XMLTreeParser::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00217 {
00218     OmiscidTrace( "XMLTreeParser::ProcessAMessage\n");
00219     msg->Display();
00220 }
00221 
00222 XMLMessage* XMLTreeParser::GetMessage()
00223 {
00224     XMLMessage* msg = NULL;
00225 
00226     SmartLocker SL_listXMLMsg(listXMLMsg);
00227 
00228     if ( listXMLMsg.GetNumberOfElements() )
00229     {
00230         listXMLMsg.First();
00231         msg = listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00232         listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00233     }
00234 
00235     return msg;
00236 }
00237 
00238 void XMLTreeParser::ClearMessages()
00239 {
00240     SmartLocker SL_listXMLMsg(listXMLMsg);
00241 
00242     for ( listXMLMsg.First(); listXMLMsg.NotAtEnd(); listXMLMsg.Next() )
00243     {
00244         delete listXMLMsg.GetCurrent();
00245         listXMLMsg.RemoveCurrent();
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 unsigned int XMLTreeParser::GetNbMessages()
00250 {
00251     SmartLocker SL_listXMLMsg(listXMLMsg);
00252 
00253     return listXMLMsg.GetNumberOfElements();
00254 }

00256 bool XMLTreeParser::WaitForMessage(unsigned long timer)
00257 {
00258     event.Reset();
00259     if(!HasMessages())
00260     {
00261         return event.Wait(timer);
00262     }
00263     return true;
00264 }

00266 
00267 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE XMLTreeParser::Run()
00268 {
00269     while(!StopPending())
00270     {
00271         try
00272         {
00273             if(WaitForMessage(10))
00274             {
00275                 ProcessMessages();
00276             }
00277         }
00278         catch(SimpleException& e)
00279         {
00280             OmiscidTrace( "XMLTreeParser::Run: ExceptionRaisedFromDown (%s)\n", e.msg.GetStr() );
00281         }
00282     }
00283 
00284     // OmiscidTrace( "ThreadWasAskedToDie\n" );
00285 }
00286 
00287 bool XMLTreeParser::HasMessages()
00288 {
00289     return GetNbMessages() != 0;
00290 }
